-1.Author: Albert
-1.quotes: a stich in time saves nine

-2.Author: Adeout
-2.quotes: a tsdjktdku in time saves nine

-2000.Author: Socrates
-2000.quotes: An unexamined life is now worth living.

-2500.Author: Marcus Aurelius
-2500.quotes: You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this and you will have strenth.

-3000.Author: Marcus Aurelius
-3000.quotes: The universe is change; our life is what our thoughts make it.

-3500.Author: Marcus Aurelius
-3500.quotes: Waste no time arguing about what a good man you should be. Be one.

-4000.Author: Epictetus
-4000.quotes: We have two ears and one mouth so that we can listen twice as much as we speak.

-4500.Author: Epictetus
-4500.quotes: Men are disturbed not by things, but by the view which they take of them.

-5000.Author: Inwerejosic
-5000.quotes: Life is too short for you to die frauning.
